Name: The Panel Remake
About the game: The Panel Remake is a puzzle game where you will turn valves, pull levers and push buttons. It's an escape room game, where you interact with a panel, complete puzzles and make your way to the exit. Start interacting with the panel elements and find the combinations. So maybe, if you discover how that panel works, you will be able to make it out. FEATURES 18 puzzles to discover and achieve Available on Windows, Mac and Linux Steam achievements
